description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Journey to the dark citadel of Nethermorne in a quest to kill demons and fulfill your destiny.  Learn spells, upgrade weapons and loot powerful items to aid you on your epic quest.
description.short: Journey to the dark citadel of Nethermorne in a quest to kill demons and fulfill your destiny.  Learn spells, upgrade weapons and loot powerful items to aid you on your epic quest.
